section.heading: Notice requirements for moratorium proceedings.
section.text: If a moratorium request meets all of the requirements set forth in § 25-352, the Board shall provide notice to the public according to the same procedures as required by § 25-421.

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: D.C. Law 15-187 substituted “§ 25-421” for “§§ 25-421 and 25-422; provided, that, for purposes of this section, the responsibilities of the applicant prescribed in § 25-422 shall be assumed by the Board”.
